item.title: On Meaning and Reference
item.description: Notes Titles On Meaning and Reference On Propositions, Meaning, Content, and Reference On Propositions, Reference, and Meaning The Meaning of Meaning References Plato stanford Theories of Meaning Plato stanford Definitions Plato stanford Reference Plato stanford Propositions Plato stanford Structured Propositions Plato stanford Singular Propositions Plato stanford Descriptions Plato stanford nonconcepual mental content Plato stanford externalism about mental content Plato stanford mental representation Plato stanford meaning normativity Plato stanford meaning holism Introduction Distinction between what you say, and what you mean.
